description: This Dart source file exports specific symbols from 'provider_stubs.dart', including ChangeNotifier, ChangeNotifierProvider, and MultiProvider, acting as an alias or facade.

classes.name: ChangeNotifier
classes.description: A class used for managing state that can be extended or mixed in to create observable objects.

classes.name: ChangeNotifierProvider
classes.description: A provider widget that makes a ChangeNotifier available to descendant widgets.

classes.name: MultiProvider
classes.description: A widget that combines multiple provider widgets into one.

methods.name: ChangeNotifier
methods.description: Constructor for ChangeNotifier, and potentially its methods for listening and notifying changes.

methods.name: ChangeNotifierProvider
methods.description: Builds a provider for ChangeNotifier objects, enabling dependency injection.

methods.name: MultiProvider
methods.description: Builds a widget that aggregates multiple providers into a single widget.
